text: ql -ayha alrswl- lhwla' alnas: qad ja'akum rasul allah bialquran aladhi fih bayan hdaytkm, faman ahtda bhdy allah fa'iinama thamarat eamalih rajet 'ilyh, wamin anhrf ean alhaqu wasrr ealaa aldalal fa'iinama dlalh wdrrh ealaa nfsh, wama 'ana mwkkal bikum hataa takunuu mwmnyn, 'iinama 'ana rasul mblligh abllighkm maa 'ursilt bh
